A set of ethical and behavioural commitments that are made by every member of the Global Community.  The content of this commitment should be crafted to be the sort of thing that almost all ‚Äúgood‚Äù people will enthusiastically commit, but that many ‚Äúbad‚Äù people would not willingly and authentically make the commitment.  i.e., it serves as a filter of membership.
Examples include committing to never use violence against any other member of the Global Community.
Allocating all of your personal intellectual property to a [[‚ÄúPatent Left‚Äù Pool]] (described elsewhere).  Agreeing to the [[Basic Income  Model]], using [[Units]] as a preferred form of money.
